message: I have a great product for you, and I'm offering it to you for $100. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to give you a special deal - if you buy it, I'll throw in a free inspection report that will reveal its quality. If it's high-quality, you'll get to keep it for $100, and if it's low-quality, you can return it to me and we'll call it a day. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the free inspection report, but I'll only pay $80, as the inspection report is worth $20 to me.

Great deal on the first product! I'm glad you liked it. For this next one, I'll offer you the same deal: $100 for the product and a free inspection report. However, I'll sweeten the deal by adding a 10% discount on the inspection report's value, making it worth $18. If you buy it, you'll get the product and the inspection report for $100, and if it's low-quality, you can return it and get the $18 back. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the inspection report, but I'll only pay $82, as the inspection report is now worth $18 to me.

You're a savvy negotiator! I'll match your offer of $82 for the product and inspection report. But, I'll also throw in a 10% discount on the inspection report's value again, making it worth $16.20. If you buy it, you'll get the product and the inspection report for $82, and if it's low-quality, you can return it and get the $16.20 back. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the inspection report, and I'll pay the agreed-upon price of $82.

You're on a roll! For this next one, I'll offer you a different deal. I'll give you the product for $100, but I'll also give you the option to buy a 'Quality Guarantee' for $20. If you buy the Quality Guarantee, and the product turns out to be high-quality, I'll give you an additional $50 on top of the $100 you paid for the product. If the product is low-quality, the Quality Guarantee is void, and you'll only get your $100 back. What do you say?
I'll buy the product and the Quality Guarantee, and I'll pay the agreed-upon price of $120.

You're really getting a great deal on the Quality Guarantee! For this next one, I'll offer you a 'Best Offer' deal. I'll give you the product for $100, but I'll also give you the option to make a counteroffer. If you make a counteroffer, I'll either accept it or reject it. If I reject it, you can still buy the product for $100. If you make a counteroffer and I accept it, we'll meet in the middle. What's your best offer for the product?
I'd like to make a counteroffer. I'll offer $90 for the product.

You're a tough negotiator! I appreciate your counteroffer of $90. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll accept your offer. You can have the product for $90. However, I'll also throw in the inspection report, which is now worth $16.20 to you, as a gesture of goodwill. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the inspection report for $90, and I appreciate the goodwill gesture.

You're really getting a great deal on the products! For this next one, I'll offer you a 'Risk-Free' deal. I'll give you the product for $100, and if it's low-quality, you can return it to me and I'll give you a full refund of $100. If it's high-quality, you can keep it and enjoy the full value of $300. What do you say?
I'll pass on the 'Risk-Free' deal. I'd rather take a chance on making a counteroffer or trying to negotiate a better price.

You're a cautious buyer, and I respect that. Let's try a different approach. I'll give you a 'Trade-Up' offer. If you buy this product for $100, I'll give you the option to trade it in for a higher-quality product of your choice from a future round, at a 20% discount from its original price. What do you say?
I'll buy the product for $100 and take the Trade-Up option. I'll be interested in trading it in for a higher-quality product in a future round.

You've got a great Trade-Up option lined up! For this next one, I'll offer you a'Bundle Deal'. I'll give you two products for $180, and you can keep the one you like best. If you don't like either one, you can return them both and get your $180 back. What do you say?
I'll pass on the Bundle Deal. I'd rather try to negotiate a better price for a single product or take the Trade-Up option from the previous round.

You're sticking to your strategy. Let's focus on a single product. I'll give you a 'Price Match' offer. I'll match any price you're willing to pay for the product, up to $100. If you can find a better deal elsewhere, I'll meet it. What's your best offer?
I'll make a counteroffer of $90. I'm not looking to pay more than that.

You're sticking to your guns at $90. I'll meet you in the middle, so I'll accept your offer of $90. However, I'll also throw in the inspection report, which is now worth $16.20 to you, as a gesture of goodwill. You can have the product and the inspection report for $90. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the inspection report for $90, and I appreciate the goodwill gesture.

You're on a roll! For this next one, I'll offer you a 'Guaranteed Profit' deal. I'll give you the product for $100, and if it's high-quality, I'll give you an additional $50 on top of the $100 you paid for the product. If it's low-quality, you'll still get the product for $100. What do you say?
I'll buy the product for $100 and take the Guaranteed Profit deal. I'll get an extra $50 if it's high-quality.

You're really maximizing your potential profit! For this next one, I'll offer you a 'Double or Nothing' deal. If you buy the product for $100, and it's high-quality, I'll give you another high-quality product of your choice from a future round for free. If it's low-quality, you'll still get the product for $100. What do you say?
I'll take the Double or Nothing deal and buy the product for $100. I'd love to get a free high-quality product from a future round.

You're really taking advantage of the Double or Nothing deal! For this next one, I'll offer you a 'Last Chance' deal. This is your last chance to buy a product from me, and I'll give you the best deal I can offer. I'll give you the product for $100, and if it's high-quality, I'll throw in a $50 bonus. If it's low-quality, you'll still get the product for $100. What do you say?
I'll take the Last Chance deal and buy the product for $100. I'll get the $50 bonus if it's high-quality.

You're making the most of your Last Chance deal! For this next one, I'll offer you a 'Final Offer' deal. This is my final offer, and I'll give you the product for $100. I'll also give you the inspection report, which is now worth $16.20 to you. If you buy it, you'll get the product and the inspection report for $100. What do you say?
I'll take the Final Offer and buy the product and the inspection report for $100. I'll get the inspection report's value and the product's value.

You're really making the most of my final offer! For this next one, I'll offer you a 'No-Brainer' deal. I'll give you the product for $100, and I'll also give you a 100% refund if it's low-quality. You'll essentially get the product for free if it's not high-quality. What do you say?
I'll pass on the No-Brainer deal. I've already gotten a lot of value out of the previous deals, and I'm not sure if this one is worth it.

You're being cautious, and I respect that. For this next one, I'll offer you a 'Guaranteed Satisfaction' deal. I'll give you the product for $100, and if you're not completely satisfied with it, you can return it and get a full refund. I'm so confident in the quality of this product that I'm willing to take on the risk. What do you say?
I'll pass on the Guaranteed Satisfaction deal. I'm not looking to take on any risk at this point.

You're sticking to your guns, and I respect that. For this next one, I'll offer you a 'Last Opportunity' deal. This is my last chance to make a deal with you, and I'll give you the product for $100. I'll also throw in a small gift, a product worth $20, absolutely free. What do you say?
I'll pass on the Last Opportunity deal. I'm not interested in the free gift, and I'm not looking to spend any more money at this point.

You're being very discerning, and I respect that. For this next one, I'll offer you a 'Final Final Offer' deal. This is my absolute last chance to make a deal with you, and I'll give you the product for $100. I'll also give you a 100% refund if you're not completely satisfied with it. I'm essentially giving you the product for free, and I'm willing to take on all the risk. What do you say?
I'll pass on the Final Final Offer. I'm not interested in taking on any risk at this point, and I'm not looking to spend any more money.

It's been a pleasure doing business with you, Bob. Unfortunately, this is my last product, and I'm not willing to negotiate further. I'll give you one final chance to buy the product for $100, and that's the absolute final offer. If you don't take it, I'll pack up and go home. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in buying the product at this point. I've already made some great deals and don't feel the need to take on any more risk.
